lead_paragraph: Potash of Canada said it believed that it could address the concerns of K&S, the German owner of Morton Salt, and that its bid was not based on closing mines or shedding jobs.

headline.main: Potash Corporation Still Interested in K&S After $8.6 Billion Offer Is Rejected

snippet: Potash of Canada said it believed that it could address the concerns of K&S, the German owner of Morton Salt, and that its bid was not based on closing mines or shedding jobs.
